Sentencas: A novel hybrid compressive mica seal was developed that showed a reduction of leak rate by about 4300 times (compared to simple mica seals) at 800 degreesC. The hybrid compressive mica seal is composed of 2 compliant glass layers and a mica layer.
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Three commercially available micas were tested in hybrid compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The best results were obtained using Muscovite single crystal mica.
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The normalized leak rate for this seal at 800 degreesC was only 1.55 x 10(-4) sccm/cm at a stress of 100 psi and a pressure gradient of 2 psi.
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Seals based on the other commercial micas (Muscovite and Phlogopite mica papers), also exhibited superior leak rates (similar to0.011 sccm/cm) compared to simple mica seals without the compliant glass layer (about 6-9 sccm/cm).
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructure of the mica was examined before and after the 800 degreesC leak tests using scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cause for the substantial reduction of the leak rate was discussed.
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the effect of the compressive stresses was also investigated.
Titulo: Ultra-low leak rate of hybrid compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells
